name: Road Racing Extreme Rivals 3D
description:
Beat your opponents on a high speed at extreme track! We invite you to a real car race – fast sport cars, brake squeak, oversteering and incredible speed! Everyone wants to win, everyone has a perfect car, so you have to bring your A-game to win! Meet Road Racing: Extreme Rivals 3D– exciting racing simulator at professional tracks!

Drive your car along the route, overrun your opponents and avoid crashing. Get a place in this crazy race and show to other runners your power!

Road Racing: Extreme Rivals 3D game features:
- Incredible meandering tracks;
- Fleet of sport cars;
- Worthy opponents;
- Realistic physics and machine control;
- Driving simulator in 3D.

The first heat is almost on – are you ready to hit the gas pedal? We wish you good luck in Road Racing: Extreme Rivals 3D!
